metadata.title: CVE-2024-56784 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Adding array index check to prevent memory corruption[Why & How]Array indices out of bound caused memory corruption. Adding checks toensure that array index stays in bound.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
